verses.verse: And he <S%G308>looked<s%> up, and <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G4145>rich<s%> men <S%G906>casting<s%> their <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1049>treasury.<s%>
And he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3998>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> in <S%G1563>thither<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3016>mites.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> has <S%G906>cast<s%> in <S%G4119>more<s%> than they all: <S%G3956><s%>

For <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> have of their <S%G4052>abundance<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> in to the <S%G1435>offerings<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> but she of her <S%G5303>penury<s%> has <S%G906>cast<s%> in <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G979>living<s%> that she had. <S%G2192><s%>

And as <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3004>spoke<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> it was <S%G2885>adorned<s%> with <S%G2573>goodly<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G334>gifts,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%>

As for <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2334>behold,<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come,<s%> in the <S%G3739>which<s%> there shall not be <S%G863>left<s%> one <S%G3037>stone<s%> on another, that shall not be <S%G2647>thrown<s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>

And they <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> but <S%G4218>when<s%> shall <S%G5023>these<s%> things be? and <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> will there be <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things shall <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass?

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Take <S%G991>heed<s%> that you be not <S%G4105>deceived:<s%> for <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; and the <S%G2540>time<s%> draws <S%G1448>near:<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> you not <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> them.

But <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G191>hear<s%> of <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G181>commotions,<s%> be not <S%G4422>terrified:<s%> for <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass; but the end <S%G5056><s%> is not by and by.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to them, <S%G1484>Nation<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%>

And <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquakes<s%> shall be in divers <S%G5117>places,<s%> and <S%G3042>famines,<s%> and <S%G3061>pestilences;<s%> and <S%G5400>fearful<s%> <S%G5400>sights<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> shall there be from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G5130>these,<s%> they shall <S%G1911>lay<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> you, and persecute <S%G1377><s%> you, delivering <S%G3860><s%> you up to the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and into <S%G5438>prisons,<s%> being <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> and <S%G2232>rulers<s%> for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake. <S%G1752><s%>
And it shall <S%G576>turn<s%> to you for a testimony. <S%G3142><s%>
Settle <S%G5087><s%> it <S%G3767>therefore<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> not to <S%G4304>meditate<s%> <S%G4304>before<s%> what you shall answer: <S%G626><s%>

For I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you a <S%G4750>mouth<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G480>adversaries<s%> shall not be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G471>gainsay<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> resist. <S%G436><s%>

And you shall be <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> by <S%G1118>parents,<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> and <S%G4773>kinfolks,<s%> and <S%G5384>friends;<s%> and some of you shall they <S%G2289>cause<s%> to be <S%G2289>put<s%> to death. <S%G2289><s%>
And you shall be <S%G3404>hated<s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake.
But there shall not an <S%G2359>hair<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>
In <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2932>possess<s%> you <S%G5216>your<s%> souls. <S%G5590><s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2944>compassed<s%> with <S%G4760>armies,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> that the <S%G2050>desolation<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> is near. <S%G1448><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> let them which are in <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains;<s%> and let them which are in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of it <S%G1633>depart<s%> out; and let not them that are in the <S%G5561>countries<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> thereinto. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>
For <S%G3778>these<s%> be the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G1557>vengeance,<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%> may be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to them that are with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and to them that give <S%G2337>suck,<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days!<s%> for there shall be <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G318>distress<s%> in the <S%G1093>land,<s%> and <S%G3709>wrath<s%> on <S%G5129>this<s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

And they shall <S%G4098>fall<s%> by the <S%G4750>edge<s%> of the <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and shall be <S%G163>led<s%> away <S%G163>captive<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations:<s%> and <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%G3961>trodden<s%> down of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2540>times<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And there shall be <S%G4592>signs<s%> in the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> and in the <S%G4582>moon,<s%> and in the <S%G798>stars;<s%> and on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G4928>distress<s%> of <S%G1484>nations,<s%> with <S%G640>perplexity;<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and the <S%G4535>waves<s%> roaring; <S%G2278><s%>

<S%G444>Men's<s%> <S%G674>hearts<s%> <S%G674>failing<s%> them for <S%G5401>fear,<s%> and for <S%G4329>looking<s%> <S%G4329>after<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G1904>coming<s%> <S%G1904>on<s%> the <S%G3625>earth:<s%> for the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> shall be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> shall they <S%G3700>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And when <S%G5130>these<s%> things <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, then <S%G352>look<s%> up, and <S%G1869>lift<s%> up <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2776>heads;<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G629>redemption<s%> draws near. <S%G1448><s%>
And he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> to them a <S%G3850>parable;<s%> <S%G1492>Behold<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the trees; <S%G1186><s%>

<S%G3752>When<s%> they <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G4261>shoot<s%> <S%G4261>forth,<s%> you <S%G991>see<s%> and <S%G1097>know<s%> of <S%G1438>your<s%> own <S%G1438>selves<s%> that <S%G2330>summer<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G1451>at<s%> hand.

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> you, <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, <S%G1097>know<s%> you that the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G1451>at<s%> hand.
<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass<s%> away, <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> be fulfilled. <S%G1096><s%>
<S%G3772>Heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G3928>pass<s%> away: but my <S%G3056>words<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass<s%> away.

And take <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G3379>any<s%> <S%G3379>time<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> be <S%G925>overcharged<s%> with <S%G2897>surfeiting,<s%> and <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> and <S%G3308>cares<s%> of this <S%G982>life,<s%> and so that <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2186>come<s%> on you unawares. <S%G160><s%>

For as a <S%G3803>snare<s%> shall it <S%G1904>come<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G2521>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G3956>whole<s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G69>Watch<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G1189>pray<s%> always, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2540><s%> that you may be <S%G2661>accounted<s%> <S%G2661>worthy<s%> to <S%G1628>escape<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things that shall <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, and to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

And in the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2250>time<s%> he was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple;<s%> and at <S%G3571>night<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G835>stayed<s%> in the <S%G3735>mount<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> the mount of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3719>came<s%> <S%G3719>early<s%> in the morning to him in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> for to <S%G191>hear<s%> him.
